Package com.base.engine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Animation class: Collection of sprites that have a delay between frames Can be started, stopped, updated, and rendered
    Audio
    Audio class to manage all audio buffers For each audio file we add a buffer to the master array Audio can set gain, pitch, loop, pause, direction of audio
    Display
    Adapted from LWJGL getting started: https://www.lwjgl.org/guide Creates a display using openGl and initializes the game Manages the gameloop
    Event
    Events are an easy way to schedule events to occur based on invocations or have events run every tick
    EventQueue
    Manages all the events running in the game
    GameObject
    Defines all objects in the game world All objects extend this class
    InputHandler
    Adapted from LWJGL 3 tutorial: https://tutorialedge.net/java/lwjgl3/lwjgl-3-keyboard-input-handler-tutorial/ Handles the input from the user (mouse and keyboard)
    Main  
    Physics
    Physics engine Checks collisions on various objects
    Sprite
    Sprite is a renderable object that can be drawn to the display
    SpriteRetriever
    Adapted from https://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/53705/how-can-i-make-a-sprite-sheet-based-animation-system Retrives a sprite from a sprite sheet by calling texture renderer
    TextRenderer
    Text renderer renders a string into a renderable object
    TextureLoader
    Excerpt from http://www.java-gaming.org/index.php?PHPSESSID=h31a7ct4qqlgrl1fij7857dcv5 topic=25516.0 By theagentd Binds a buffered image to a texture id in openGl
    Vector2f
    Vector class (takes two params and creates a vector)
